short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover peace in simplicity with NadaTab, a Chrome extension that does absolutely nothing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NadaTab is a Chrome extension that proudly does absolutely nothing. By installing NadaTab, you are acknowledging that some things in life have no meaning or purpose, just as this extension has no functionality.

NadaTab will not change your browsing experience in any way. It will not provide any additional features, notifications, or distractions. Instead, it will be there, quietly occupying space on your browser.
